0.name: Foresight
0.Text: Defense: +2 block to this card per opponent card played this turn

1.name: Quick thinking
1.Text: consume all remaining ap to draw X extra cards

4.name: Fatal strike
4.Text: If target part has <7 HP, this card deals +3 dmg

5.name: counter
5.Text: If opponent play card here, +3 Melee dmg next turn

6.name: Grapple
6.Text: ON HIT → Enemy next melee card costs +1 AP

7.name: Tight Grip
7.Text: If played melee card this turn: +3 Gun dmg next turn

8.name: Blind Fire
8.Text: randomly Hit head or leg instead

9.name: limb-Wrench
9.Text: ON HIT → Opponent discard 1 random card in hand

11.name: SWEEP KICk
11.Text: ON HIT → Disable opponent leg for 1 turn

12.name: Feint shot
12.Text: Deal additional 1 dmg to the other body part

13.name: Blade Distraction
13.Text: Deal 3 dmg to main target, 1 to the other

14.name: Hamstring
14.Text: if opponent has weak here, deal +2 dmg

15.name: stand your ground
15.Text: If opponent play card here, draw 1 extra card next turn

16.name: take aim
16.Text: next gun card targeting this part deals +2 dmg

17.name: Bring gun to fist fight
17.Text: WHEN PLAYED →  discard a melee card to draw a gun card

18.name: Tactical Reload
18.Text: your next gun card this turn +3 dmg

23.name: minigun
23.Text: each pts of dmg is dealt to a random body part

24.name: roll & Load
24.Text: Next gun card this turn +3 DMG

25.name: Piercing Shot
25.Text: Blocked: Deal 1 DMG directly to this body part

27.name: Flying Kick
27.Text: Deal +1 dmg per card in hand

28.name: sweeping kick
28.Text: ON HIT → Disable Body for 1 turn, otherwise Melee Combo

29.name: preparation
29.Text: Choose: your melee/Gun cards deals +1 DMg this game (cannot stack)

31.name: Knock Knock
31.Text: Disable a random bodypart that has > 5 hp

32.name: One With Shadows
32.Text: the next card played is invisible

34.name: Smoke Bomb
34.Text: this bodypart is invisible until the end of your next turn.

35.name: Mirror Maze
35.Text: Put a fake copy of this in each other bodypart.

36.name: Feint
36.Text: On reveal: play a 1-AP card in another bodypart

38.name: Vertical Slice
38.Text: Deal 1 dmg to body and leg

48.name: ONE STEP AHEAD
48.Text: on hit → their NEXT two attacks are exposed.

49.name: OMEGA THROW
49.Text: ON HIT → reveal a random card in their hand.

50.name: OMEGA THROW
50.Text: ON HIT → reveal a random card in their hand.

51.name: PLUS ONE SHOT
51.Text: must BE PLayed with another melee attack

52.name: disorient
52.Text: WHEN PLAYED → apply WEAK to their head.

53.name: head scissors lock
53.Text: the next card they draw is exposed.

54.name: DODGE HEAD
54.Text: play a random melee card from your discards, +3 dmg

56.name: WRAPAROUND
56.Text: ON HIT → you Discard a random card.

57.name: takedown
57.Text: melee combo. [You may play a melee card in this same slot.]

58.name: rapid strikes
58.Text: when played → if you have no cards in hand, draw a card.

59.name: push the pace
59.Text: when played → discard a card to play two 1 AP cards from your discards.

60.name: disorient
60.Text: WHEN PLAYED → apply WEAK to their head.

61.name: takedown
61.Text: melee combo. [You may play a melee card in this same slot.]

62.name: rapid kick
62.Text: when played → if you have no cards in hand, draw one.

63.name: finishing Shot
63.Text: If they have a weak or destroyed body part, this does double damage

65.name: curb stomp
65.Text: IF ENEMY body or leg < 5, deal double damage

68.name: low blow
68.Text: ON hit → Disable MELEE ATTACKS NEXT TURN

69.name: TACTICAL STRIKE
69.Text: ON hit → GAIN +1 AP NEXT TURN

70.name: BODY SLAM
70.Text: DEAL +2 DMG IF ENEMY HAS WEAK

71.name: CRUMPLING STRIKE
71.Text: APPLY WEAK TO HEAD AND BODY

73.name: zen state
73.Text: your first gun card next turn gains +3 dmg

74.name: execution
74.Text: if head hp is 4 or less, deal double damage

76.name: adrenaline
76.Text: take 2 dmg to body. draw 2 cards

77.name: open fire
77.Text: deal dmg to all body parts

78.name: counter stance
78.Text: Defense: if enemy attacks your body, deal 4 dmg

88.name: Upright stance
88.Text: WHEN PLAYED → next melee attack cannot be blocked

89.name: Crouching stance
89.Text: WHEN PLAYED → 1 AP cards and below deal +1 dmg this turn

91.name: Bob & Weave
91.Text: successful dodge Plays an uppercut Card here

92.name: Block
92.Text: Defense: If opponent hit here, play a jab card here

94.name: Hidden Stash
94.Text: when played → add 2 random throw card to your hand

96.name: peace of mind
96.Text: discard your hand to get a random throw card each

97.name: ninja storm
97.Text: play 5 random throw card each targeting a random bodypart

98.name: Side step
98.Text: when played → swap bodypart with next attack card

99.name: something Up my sleeves
99.Text: Repeat your last throw card twice

100.name: Hidden Strings
100.Text: deal 1 dmg per throw card played last turn

110.name: weapon master
110.Text: your gun cards have Gun Combo
